Articles.Content: Hey there everyone. Saw this game on the internet about 2 weeks ago, played the demo, and just had to get the full game. Ive been having a blast with it. got a few ships in to orbit, and even into orbit around the moon. I the MechJeb and decided to download it, so I did. but, I cant figure out how to bring it up. how do you open MechJeb?

Welcome aboard.

To open it you need to add the MechJeb part to your vessel.

enjoy
